products.name: Ashwagandha Root Powder
products.description: Premium organic Ashwagandha (Withania somnifera) root powder, traditionally used for stress relief, energy boost, and overall vitality. Our ashwagandha is sourced from certified organic farms and processed using cold-grinding to preserve its natural potency.
products.shortDescription: Organic stress-relief adaptogen for energy & vitality
products.usage: Mix 1/2 teaspoon with warm milk or water. Take twice daily.
products.metaTitle: Organic Ashwagandha Powder - Stress Relief & Energy
products.metaDescription: Premium organic Ashwagandha root powder for stress relief, energy boost, and overall vitality. 100% natural and lab-tested.

products.name: Triphala Digestive Capsules
products.description: Traditional Triphala formulation in easy-to-take capsules. Made from three powerful fruits - Amla, Haritaki, and Bibhitaki - this ancient Siddha & Ayurveda blend supports healthy digestion, detoxification, and regular bowel movements.
products.shortDescription: Classic digestive blend for gut health & detox
products.usage: Take 2 capsules with water before bedtime or as directed.
products.metaDescription: Traditional Triphala capsules for healthy digestion, detox, and gut health. Made with Amla, Haritaki, and Bibhitaki.

products.name: Brahmi Memory Oil
products.description: Cold-pressed Brahmi oil infused with coconut oil for enhanced mental clarity and memory. This traditional Siddha & Ayurveda preparation helps calm the mind, improve concentration, and promote healthy sleep patterns when used for head massage.
products.shortDescription: Traditional brain-boosting oil for memory & focus
products.ingredients: Brahmi Extract, Cold-Pressed Coconut Oil, Bhringraj
products.usage: Warm the oil and massage gently onto scalp. Leave for 30 minutes or overnight.
products.metaTitle: Brahmi Oil for Memory & Hair - Siddha & Ayurveda Head Massage Oil
products.metaDescription: Traditional Brahmi oil for enhanced memory, focus, and healthy hair. Perfect for relaxing head massage.

products.name: Tulsi Immunity Drops
products.description: Concentrated Holy Basil (Tulsi) extract drops for daily immunity support. Our triple-extraction process ensures maximum potency of this sacred Siddha & Ayurveda herb, known for its powerful immunomodulatory and antioxidant properties.
products.shortDescription: Concentrated Tulsi for daily immune support
products.usage: Add 10-15 drops to water or tea, twice daily.
products.metaTitle: Tulsi Immunity Drops - Daily Immune Booster
products.metaDescription: Concentrated Tulsi drops for daily immunity support. Triple-extracted Holy Basil for maximum potency.

products.name: Neem & Turmeric Face Wash
products.description: Gentle yet effective Siddha & Ayurveda face wash combining the antibacterial power of Neem with the brightening properties of Turmeric. Suitable for all skin types, it deeply cleanses while maintaining natural skin moisture.
products.shortDescription: Antibacterial face wash for clear, glowing skin
products.ingredients: Neem Extract, Turmeric, Aloe Vera, Coconut-based Surfactants
products.usage: Apply to wet face, massage gently, and rinse with water. Use twice daily.
products.metaTitle: Neem Turmeric Face Wash - Siddha & Ayurveda Skin Care
products.metaDescription: Natural Neem & Turmeric face wash for clear, glowing skin. Antibacterial and suitable for all skin types.

products.name: Chyawanprash Immunity Jam
products.description: Traditional Chyawanprash made with 40+ Siddha & Ayurveda herbs and Amla as the key ingredient. This time-tested immunity booster is prepared following ancient recipes to ensure maximum efficacy and authentic taste.
products.shortDescription: 40+ herb immunity jam with Amla base
benefits: Rich in Vitamin C from Amla
products.ingredients: Amla, Ashwagandha, Ghee, Honey, 40+ Siddha & Ayurveda Herbs
products.usage: Take 1-2 teaspoons with warm milk, morning and evening.
products.metaTitle: Chyawanprash - Traditional Siddha & Ayurveda Immunity Jam
products.metaDescription: Authentic Chyawanprash with 40+ herbs for complete immunity support. Perfect for the whole family.

products.name: Bhringraj Hair Oil
products.description: Premium Bhringraj (Eclipta alba) hair oil for thick, healthy, and lustrous hair. Infused with sesame oil and other Siddha & Ayurveda herbs, this oil strengthens hair from root to tip and prevents premature greying.
products.shortDescription: Siddha & Ayurveda oil for thick, healthy hair
products.usage: Warm and apply to scalp and hair. Massage for 10 minutes. Leave overnight for best results.
products.metaTitle: Bhringraj Hair Oil - Siddha & Ayurveda Hair Growth Oil
products.metaDescription: Premium Bhringraj oil for thick, healthy hair and prevention of premature greying.

products.name: Shatavari Women's Wellness
products.description: Pure Shatavari (Asparagus racemosus) capsules specifically formulated for women's health. This revered Siddha & Ayurveda herb supports hormonal balance, reproductive health, and overall vitality for women of all ages.
products.shortDescription: Herbal support for women's hormonal balance
products.usage: Take 1-2 capsules twice daily with water or milk.
products.metaTitle: Shatavari Capsules - Women's Wellness & Hormonal Balance
products.metaDescription: Pure Shatavari for women's hormonal balance, reproductive health, and overall vitality.
